qas.question: What color did he refer to himself as?

context: Egyptian President <a0_0>Anwar Sadat<a0_0/> had a mother who was a dark-skinned Nubian Sudanese woman and a father who was a lighter-skinned <a1_0>Egyptian<a1_0/>. In response to an advertisement for an acting position, as a young man he said, "I am not white but I am not exactly black either. My blackness is tending to <a2_0>reddish<a2_0/>".
